info.header.zh: 关于试玩广告的重要信息

info.efficiency-note.zh: 导出试玩广告的项目运行效率会[b]显著降低[/b]，且支持起来要复杂得多。在尽可能地情况下，请优先选择导出 [b]zip[/b] 文件结构，这将会包含所有游戏资源，让项目运行起来更加高效和简单。
info.efficiency-note.en: Projects exported this way are [b]significantly less efficient[/b] and far more complex to support. Wherever possible, [b]use the zip export option instead[/b] which produces a zip file of assets, which is much more efficient and simpler. Only use the single file option when it is required for meeting restrictions.

info.features-note.zh: 对于单文件格式，由于将所有资源打包到一个文件中会受到非常极端的技术限制，因此并非所有功能都能正常运行。请务必仔细测试。
info.features-note.en: Due to the extreme technical restrictions involved in packing all assets in to a single file, not all features may work in this mode. Be sure to test carefully.

info.deprecation-note.zh: 这种极端的技术也很难以长期维护，因此[b]将来可能会删除单文件格式的支持[/b]。如果您的广告商需要您提供此格式，请建议他们改用 zip 格式，这样更容易维护。
info.deprecation-note.en: The extreme technical restrictions are also very difficult to support long-term. [b]Support for this mode may be removed in future.[/b] If your ad provider requires this format, please ask them to support the zip format instead, which is far easier to support.

info.playable-ads-link.zh: 了解更多关于[a1]试玩广告[/a1]格式。
info.playable-ads-link.en: Learn more about the [a1]Playable Ad format[/a1].
